name: PLANET? FLICK IT!
description:
PLANET? FLICK IT! is a Clicker based game made for Untitled Game Jam 68!

Click (Flick) a planet, it does an orbit around the sun and adds to your score!  However there is a twist to the standard clicker game, there are also meteors and they will destroy your planets.  Run out of planets, and it's game over!  

Game features 9 planets to unlock, 5 difficulty levels & a high score system so you can keep track of you best score!

Enjoy!
